content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Claudia Sheinbaum

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Claudia Sheinbaum, the 66th and current president of Mexico. Claudia Sheinbaum has made 5 international trips to 5 countries during her presidency so far, which began on October 1, 2024.
Summary
The number of visits per country where President Sheinbaum traveled are:
* One visit to Brazil, Canada, Honduras, Guatemala and Panama
2024

|-

|Panama City
|17 November
|Stopover on the way to Brazil. Met with Minister of Foreign Affairs Javier Martínez-Acha.
|-

|Rio de Janeiro
|18-19 November
|Attended the 2024 G20 Rio de Janeiro summit.
